        public ContactList load(java.lang.String filename)
        This method aids the effective loading of data from a text file into a contact list
        Parameters:
        filename - this string represents the name where data is to be read from
        Returns:
        ContactList returns a new contact list with items from the file as new contacts

        Returns:
